tool_description: Validates structured citation data against academic standards and checks for required fields based on citation type.

citation_type.description: Type of citation: journal, book, website, conference, thesis

error_messages: Missing required fields: Ensure all required fields for the citation type are provided.
Invalid year format: Year must be a 4-digit number between 1800 and current year + 2.
Invalid citation type: Use one of [journal, book, website, conference, thesis].
Empty author list: Provide at least one author name.
usage: Provide structured citation data including authors, title, year, and citation_type. The tool validates completeness and correctness according to academic standards.

is_valid.description: Whether the citation meets validation criteria
